### Dissertation

My dissertation focuses on the intersection of criminal violence and gender with a specialized focus on Mexico. I explore three various stages of the electoral process and how criminal violence plays a role.

*Chair:* Lauren Young

*Committee Members:* Sandra Ley, Juan Tellez, and Hanno Hilbig
